column4: im tryin to get multiple sounds working right now on dapper drake, i'd like to see someone else asound.conf file so i can confirm if mine is correct or not
im tryin to get multiple sounds working right now on dapper drake, i'd like to see someone else asound.conf file so i can confirm if mine is correct or not
save that as .asoundrc in your /home/user dir. should work fine. also make sure you use alsa as default output sink. if you use esd, kill it (killall esd).
